0.item_name: OttLite DIBALA LED Desk Lamp with Clock
0.description: This is a second-hand OttLite DIBALA LED Desk Lamp with a clock feature. It has a sleek and modern design that is perfect for any desk or bedside table, offering bright and energy-efficient LED lighting. The lamp includes a digital clock display showing the time, date, day, and temperature. The second-hand item is in good condition, with some minor signs of wear and tear but fully functional. Ideal for reading, studying, or working, and it adds an aesthetic touch to your space.

It's ideal for carrying small essentials and perfect for everyday use or travel. Despite being pre-owned, the pouch maintains its functionality and stylish appearance.

Please note that it's a previously owned product, and some minor scuffs or scratches may be present.

4.description: This Doseno Jugakor VENNERLI OTTEN JIMACRO AQUAFIT Sports Water Bottle offers the perfect blend of functionality and style. It features a convenient handle and a sturdy lid with a straw, making it ideal for athletes and fitness enthusiasts. Despite being used, the bottle maintains its usability for hydration during workouts or everyday use.

5.description: This is a pre-owned Nike MHXYZHW11757 black shoulder bag. The bag is in good condition with minor signs of wear. The strap is slightly different from the new version, showcasing a unique pattern. Despite these minor differences, the bag is fully functional, clean, and retains its sporty style. Ideal for carrying personal items comfortably and stylishly.

6.description: This Bucky Eye Mask for Sleeping is in very good condition. The item shows minimal signs of wear, and the fabric is clean and intact. This sleep mask is perfect for blocking out light and ensuring a restful sleep. Designed with comfort in mind, it's an excellent accessory for home or travel. Though used, it retains the value and functionality similar to a new one, making it a great deal for those seeking quality and affordability.

7.description: These casual shoes combine elements from Skechers, adidas, and PUMA. The shoes are second-hand but in good condition, showing some signs of wear such as slight dirt on the sole and minor scuff marks on the upper part. Ideal for everyday use, they offer comfort and style for casual outings and light activities.

8.item_name: Nike Black Logo Crossbody Bag MHXYZHW11757
8.description: This Nike Black Logo Crossbody Bag (Model MHXYZHW11757) is a stylish accessory perfect for carrying essentials. The second-hand bag is in good condition, with some minor signs of wear visible on the front. It features a prominent Nike logo and additional green accents, with a wide, branded strap for comfortable carrying. Ideal for daily use, this bag offers both functionality and a trendy look.
